Package homework1

Class Post

java.lang.Object
homework1.Post
public class Post extends Object
ever post is a object of the post class. it has post id , account id, number of likes... etc...

    • Post

      public Post(int id, int ac_id, String temp_like, String temp_comment, String temp_content)
      Every post is object of the Post classes. It includes number of the likes who liked it. Number of the comments and who says what.
      Parameters:
      id - post id
      ac_id - account id who did the interaction.
      temp_like - who liked when it was created
      temp_comment - it is for put a comment when constructer. Otherwise leave it empty.
      temp_content -

      public void WasLiked(Account obj) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      callers likes a post of the parameter one
      Parameters:
      obj - this is account of the be liked
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - it throws exception if number of likes drops below to zero

    • commented

      public void commented(Account commenter, Comment itsIdea)
      For making a comments this method is calling. owner of the posts call this methods.
      Parameters:
      commenter - who comments the post
      itsIdea - his/her comments as a parameter.

    • see_comments
